description.value:
Your psionic influence telekinetically lifts and transports someone to a new location at your will. Choose a creature within 60 feet of you. The target jumps up to 30 feet in any direction. You choose the direction of this jump but it must end on solid ground that you can see. An unwilling target must roll a Reflex save against your spell DC to avoid being flung.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is moved half the distance and lands on the closest solid ground.

Failure The creature is flung the full distance.

Critical Failure As Failure, and the creature lands @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} at the end of the jump.

Heightened (5th) You can either move the target up to 60 feet or target up to five creatures in range.
